AddSharesToExpressSync.title: AddSharesToExpressSync
AddSharesToExpressSync.summary: Adds shares to an express synchronization group.

CreateGateway.title: CreateGateway
CreateGateway.summary: Creates a subscription or pay-as-you-go gateway in a gateway cluster.

CreateGatewayBlockVolume.title: CreateGatewayBlockVolume
CreateGatewayBlockVolume.summary: Creates a volume for an Internet Small Computer System Interface (iSCSI) gateway.

CreateGatewayCacheDisk.title: CreateGatewayCacheDisk
CreateGatewayCacheDisk.summary: Creates a cache disk for a gateway.

CreateGatewayFileShare.title: CreateGatewayFileShare
CreateGatewayFileShare.summary: Creates a share for a file gateway.

CreateGatewayLogging.title: CreateGatewayLogging
CreateGatewayLogging.summary: Create a gateway log monitoring task.

CreateGatewaySMBUser.title: CreateGatewaySMBUser
CreateGatewaySMBUser.summary: Adds an SMB user and password to a gateway.

DeleteGateway.title: DeleteGateway
DeleteGateway.summary: Deletes a pay-as-you-go gateway from its cluster.

DeleteGatewayBlockVolumes.title: DeleteGatewayBlockVolumes
DeleteGatewayBlockVolumes.summary: Deletes a volume from an Internet Small Computer System Interface (iSCSI) gateway.

DeleteGatewayCacheDisk.title: DeleteGatewayCacheDisk
DeleteGatewayCacheDisk.summary: Deletes a cache disk from a gateway.

DeleteGatewayFileShares.title: DeleteGatewayFileShares
DeleteGatewayFileShares.summary: Deletes a share from a gateway.

DeleteGatewayLogging.title: DeleteGatewayLogging
DeleteGatewayLogging.summary: Deletes a log monitoring project for a gateway.

DeleteGatewaySMBUser.title: DeleteGatewaySMBUser
DeleteGatewaySMBUser.summary: Deletes a Server Message Block (SMB) user from a gateway.

DeleteStorageBundle.title: DeleteStorageBundle
DeleteStorageBundle.summary: Deletes a gateway cluster. You must delete all gateways in a gateway cluster before you can delete the gateway cluster.

DescribeExpressSyncShares.title: DescribeExpressSyncShares
DescribeExpressSyncShares.summary: Queries the shares that are added or can be added to express synchronization groups. The returned information includes the gateway name, cluster ID, share name, and more.

DescribeExpressSyncs.title: DescribeExpressSyncs
DescribeExpressSyncs.summary: Queries information about the express synchronization groups, including the name, ID, and associated Object Storage Service (OSS) bucket.

DescribeGateway.title: DescribeGateway
DescribeGateway.summary: Queries the information about a gateway, such as the status and type.

DescribeGatewayADInfo.title: DescribeGatewayADInfo
DescribeGatewayADInfo.summary: Queries information about the AD server configured for the gateway.

DescribeGatewayBlockVolumes.title: DescribeGatewayBlockVolumes
DescribeGatewayBlockVolumes.summary: Queries volume details of an Internet Small Computer System Interface (iSCSI) gateway, such as the status, amount of transferred data, IP address, volume size, port, Challenge Handshake Authentication Protocol (CHAP) usage, bucket SSL security settings, logical unit number (LUN), and volume status.

DescribeGatewayCaches.title: DescribeGatewayCaches
DescribeGatewayCaches.summary: Queries the information about cache disks of a gateway.

DescribeGatewayDNS.title: DescribeGatewayDNS
DescribeGatewayDNS.summary: Queries DNS servers configured for a gateway.

DescribeGatewayFileShares.title: DescribeGatewayFileShares
DescribeGatewayFileShares.summary: Queries shares for a file gateway.

DescribeGatewayFileStatus.title: DescribeGatewayFileStatus
DescribeGatewayFileStatus.summary: Queries the status of a file in a share of a file gateway.

DescribeGatewayImages.title: DescribeGatewayImages
DescribeGatewayImages.summary: Queries the image information about an on-premises gateway, including the name and description.

DescribeGatewayLogging.title: DescribeGatewayLogging
DescribeGatewayLogging.summary: Queries the logging configurations of a gateway, including the logging status, Simple Log Service (SLS) project name, and Logstore name.

DescribeGatewayNFSClients.title: DescribeGatewayNFSClients
DescribeGatewayNFSClients.summary: Queries the NFS clients of a file gateway.

DescribeGatewaySMBUsers.title: DescribeGatewaySMBUsers
DescribeGatewaySMBUsers.summary: Queries the SMB users of a gateway.

DescribeGateways.title: DescribeGateways
DescribeGateways.summary: Queries a list of gateways. The returned information includes gateway IDs and names.

DescribeStorageBundle.title: DescribeStorageBundle
DescribeStorageBundle.summary: Queries the information about a gateway cluster, such as the region, name, and description of the gateway cluster.

DescribeStorageBundles.title: DescribeStorageBundles
DescribeStorageBundles.summary: Queries the information about gateway clusters in the specified region. The information of a gateway cluster includes the name, description, and the time at which the gateway cluster was created.

DescribeTasks.title: DescribeTasks
DescribeTasks.summary: Queries task information, including task progress and name.

DisableGatewayLogging.title: DisableGatewayLogging
DisableGatewayLogging.summary: Disables log monitoring for a gateway.

EnableGatewayLogging.title: EnableGatewayLogging
EnableGatewayLogging.summary: Enables log monitoring for a gateway.

ExpandGatewayFileShare.title: ExpandGatewayFileShare
ExpandGatewayFileShare.summary: Increases the capacity of a share for an on-premises gateway.

ExpandGatewayNetworkBandwidth.title: ExpandGatewayNetworkBandwidth
ExpandGatewayNetworkBandwidth.summary: Increases the public network bandwidth level for a gateway.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries tags of one or more gateways.

ModifyGateway.title: ModifyGateway
ModifyGateway.summary: Modifies the basic information of a gateway, including the name and description.

ModifyGatewayFileShareWatermark.title: ModifyGatewayFileShareWatermark
ModifyGatewayFileShareWatermark.summary: Modifies the threshold for cache data drop.

ModifyStorageBundle.title: ModifyStorageBundle
ModifyStorageBundle.summary: Modifies the information about a gateway cluster, including the name and description of the gateway cluster.

OpenSgwService.title: OpenSgwService
OpenSgwService.summary: Activates the Cloud Storage Gateway (CSG) service. To use the CSG service, you must first activate the service.

RemoveSharesFromExpressSync.title: RemoveSharesFromExpressSync
RemoveSharesFromExpressSync.summary: Removes one or more shares from an express synchronization group.

SetGatewayADInfo.title: SetGatewayADInfo
SetGatewayADInfo.summary: Enables or disables an Active Directory (AD) domain for a gateway.

SetGatewayDNS.title: SetGatewayDNS
SetGatewayDNS.summary: Configures a DNS server for a gateway.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Creates tags and attaches the tags to resources.

TriggerGatewayRemoteSync.title: TriggerGatewayRemoteSync
TriggerGatewayRemoteSync.summary: Actively triggers a file gateway to perform a reverse synchronization on the specified path.

UpdateGatewayBlockVolume.title: UpdateGatewayBlockVolume
UpdateGatewayBlockVolume.summary: Updates the configuration of a volume for an Internet Small Computer System Interface (iSCSI) gateway.

UpdateGatewayFileShare.title: UpdateGatewayFileShare
UpdateGatewayFileShare.summary: Updates the configuration of a share for a file gateway.
